vsParam:
Uh? Cresson, why are you gloomy?
What's going on?

Er... When I went out to kill the monster
haunting around the village...

I found that the monster is way tougher than I thought...
It took me quite some time to kill it, and some villagers got hurt.

Oh my... But you have killed the monster, right?
No need to feel guilty...

Ha ha... Thank you. But I still feel bad since I failed
to protect the things I wanted to protect...

Er, I know that...
But I just couldn't let it go...

The strongest knight in the kingdom wouldn't
make such a mistake... Darn it, I'm so useless!

Hmm... Seems that he's been hit hard.
Is there anything we can do to cheer him up...

I'd like to have a word with you.
Cresson. Are you... an idiot?

Something wrong with me calling an idiot idiot?
Who would indulge in a failure except an idiot!

Things would be different if you were stronger? You think you
could protect them if you are stronger? Get over yourself!

No matter how powerful or confident you are! There are
many things in this world you can't protect! That's the fact!

But, Cresson, the most important things are beyond the battlefield.
A knight's job is not merely "protecting".

Can't you do something for those injured?
Who can sympathize most with people affected by monsters?

Those knights you respect... Weren't they your
spiritual support?

More important things... are beyond the battlefield.
Spiritual... support! Yeah! I got it, Captain!

[px].
Sorry, can you make some medicine for me?

Medicine?
Why do you need medicine all of a sudden?

I want to deliver some medicine to the injured villagers.
That's the only thing I can do now!

I think they are still frightened now...
I want to become their spiritual support! So... please!

Hehe, that's not something you can say no to. As his friend...
make him some super effective medicine, [px]!

That's right!
Well, let's start synthesizing!
